import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import parse from "html-react-parser"; import styles from "./ProductDetail.module.css"; const ProductDetail = ({ products }) => { const { id } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const index = products.findIndex((x) => x.id == id); const product = products[index]; const radio = product.modifiers[1]; const input = product.modifiers[0]; useEffect(() => { dispatch({ type: "Header", payload: { menu: "Shop", name: "Vitamins & Supplements", title: product.name, description: product.meta_description, price: product.price, }, }); }, []); return (
{parse(product.description)}

How would you like to purchase this product?

); }; export default ProductDetail;
